Observed at: North Mountain 3:00 AM ADT Monday 17 April 2023

Wind: SSE 8 km/h

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches developing overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 10:03 PM ADT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers or drizzle early in the morning. Clearing late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 12. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 10:03 PM ADT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of showers late in the evening and overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 10:03 PM ADT Sunday 16 April 2023
